content.question: The American Indian civil rights movement differed from other civil rights movements at the time because it

choices.label: debated whether to use violent or nonviolent protest tactics
sought to gain compensation for past government land policies
focused on resisting the military draft during the Vietnam War
supported the effort to reduce pollution produced by power plants

content.answer: sought to gain compensation for past government land policies

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
